item.title: My Docker aliases
item.description: I have been using docker very often now and because I have been spending most of time in the terminal it made sense to use alias to reduce the typing. [gist id = “d6b41d000b93f3ecc3e7a1b900c7382c”] I have curated this from others and have also customized to what I want. All my aliases are stored in my github repo https://github.com/naveensrinivasan/dotvim/blob/master/zshrc
